channel.title: Problems with making a client/web client
channel.description:
i've been search topics for a few weeks on moparscape and other forums. now i have a working client/server offline. http://www.moparisthebest.com/smf/index.php/topic,345782.0.html i have bought a domain and hosting but now i need to get it off my PC and on the hosting. i've looked through threads and threads, atm i don't need a webclient a download able one will be OK if anyone of you could point me in the right direction a a helpful thread or even help me through msn mattbenson@live.co.uk it will be much appricicated.
Thanks Matt [br][br][size=1]Posted on: April 12, 2009, 03:47:12 pm[/size][hr]or even looking for a partner, i have 3 years coding in PHP,HTML and marketing experience
